definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Qi4 hou4 Bian4 hua4 Kuang4 jia4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 聯合國氣候變化框架公約

definition: (music) accidental (a note foreign to the key signature)

sentences.english: With all the variety and adventure, Able Seaman Green said she enjoyed her work.
sentences.chinese: 面對變化和冒險，二等兵格林說她非常喜歡她的工作。

sentences.english: Elevational and latitudinal trends were not pronounced.
sentences.chinese: 海拔和緯度的變化趨勢不明顯。

sentences.english: Similar opera libretto libretto, changing the length of sentence.
sentences.chinese: 唱詞類似戲曲唱詞，句式長短富於變化。

sentences.english: The boys are seen with some style changes and dramatic smoky eye make up.
sentences.chinese: 男孩們看起來造型有了些變化，而且還化了煙燻妝。

sentences.english: The change of organic acids in rice wine with the extension of fermentation time was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了江米酒中有機酸的成分及其隨發酵時間的變化。

sentences.english: The master bedroom of Room 318 had changed little since his stay 17 years earlier.
sentences.chinese: 318房的主臥室和他十七年前入住時相比變化不大。

sentences.english: Small-signal diodes are manufactured with varying response times to changes in voltage.
sentences.chinese: 小信號二極管的電壓變化響應時間可長可短。

sentences.english: The temperature of cold-blooded animals change with the temperature of the surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 冷血動物的體溫隨着周圍的環境的改變而變化。

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不關注森林，那麼氣候變化問題就是無法解決的。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 擴充性是指易於修改軟件以適應規格變化。

sentences.english: BELLISARIO: To be honest, what's changed for me is my schedule.
sentences.chinese: 老實說，變化最多的是我的日程表。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能夠反覆感染我們的原因在於病毒的不斷變化。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件類型，如變化或中間步驟，被區別對待。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均氣溫紀錄對認識氣候變化的過程至關重要。

sentences.english: According to Polson, bands' music changes when they go mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 波爾森表示，樂隊在走向主流後，音樂發生了變化。

sentences.english: If you pivot in another direction, the app follows.
sentences.chinese: 如果你轉向另一個方向，它也會隨着變化。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
